TechMinsk powered by Google Developers Launchpad will support the growing startup industry in Belarus.

Learn More

We are coming up with more news concerning our
2019 accelerator batch soon!

  • 9 batches

  • 100+ mentors

  • 125+M raised

Founded in 2013 with the support of USAID and based at Imaguru Startup HUB, TechMinsk is designed to help top innovative startups from the region scale globally. Through 9 completed batches we created a cohort of startups operating today in different parts of the world.

We are starting a new chapter of TechMinsk powered by Google Launchpad to provide best talent from Belarus with top notch global tech and business expertise and funding.
